body:
* Intel extends cash tender offer for all outstanding shares of Mobileye

* Intel - unit extended offering period of its previously announced all cash tender offer to purchase all of outstanding ordinary shares of mobileye n.v.

* Tender offer is now scheduled to expire at 5:00 p.m., New York City Time, on August 11, 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
header: BRIEF-Intel extends cash tender offer for all outstanding shares of Mobileye
